PackageOracle.name: PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCI_CUR_ITEM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCI_CUR_ITEM
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : pkg_vnt_process
|| Created By : Knoll
|| Created Date : 04-AUG-2014
|| Subject Area : Product
|| Description : The package pkg_vnt_load_oci_cur_item controls the initial load of the
|| Vantage oci_cur_item table into SOLODB. load_order will not
|| update the staging table - run it before load_service.
|| Change log:
||
|| Changed By Changed On Change Description
|| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 10-Nov-2014 Standardization Changes
******************************************************************************************************************/
IS
PROCEDURE LOAD(
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_this_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_max_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_batchsize NUMBER DEFAULT 1000 );
END pkg_vnt_load_oci_cur_item;

body.name: PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCI_CUR_ITEM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCI_CUR_ITEM
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : pkg_vnt_load_oci_cur_item
|| Created By : Knoll
|| Created Date : 04-AUG-2014
|| Subject Area : Product
|| Description : The package pkg_vnt_load_oci_cur_item controls the initial load of the
|| Vantage oci_cur_item table into SOLODB. load_order will not
|| update the staging table - run it before load_service.
|| Change log:
||
|| Changed By Changed On Change Description
|| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 10-Nov-2014 Standardization Changes
|| knoll 05-Dec-2014 Changed FILTER_ITEM_FOR_ORDER so that items are treated as either
|| prod_order/special_request items or work_order items, not both.
||
|| Senthil 13-Dec-2014 Changed FILTER_ITEM_FOR_ORDER. Added check to ignore WO items if no WO
|| (job_bus_interact_id IS NOT NULL)
||
|| Senthil 05-Jan-2015 Changed to use new xref table t_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref
||
|| Senthil 07-Jan-2015 Static data change for bus_interact_type_cd column in t_bus_interaction table
|| and request_type_cd column in t_request table
|| Cognizant 07-Apr-2015 Code changes to remove the descrepanies between NRT/RRT , Initial Load and Reconciliation
|| Cognizant 17-Apr-2015 Transformation logic of column item_status_opi modified.
******************************************************************************************************************/
SUBTYPE t_unit_name IS VARCHAR2 (30);

c_stg_processed CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'P';
c_stg_in_progress CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'I';
c_stg_error CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'E';
c_pkg_name CONSTANT t_unit_name := 'PKG_VNT_LOAD_OCI_CUR_ITEM';
c_null_date CONSTANT DATE := TO_DATE ('00010101', 'YYYYMMDD');
c_bulk_errors EXCEPTION;
PRAGMA EXCEPTION_INIT (c_bulk_errors, -24381);
g_this_thread NUMBER := 1;
g_max_thread NUMBER := 1;
g_batchsize NUMBER := 1000;

-- Staged OCI_CUR_ITEM for loading services
CURSOR cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc
IS
SELECT
-- staging control data
oci.ROWID AS ID, oci.record_load_cd,

-- surrogate keys
s_billing_prod_inst_id.NEXTVAL AS billing_prod_inst_id,
xref.account_id,
-- columns
oci.serv_id_oci AS source_system_id,
oci.bill_cde_oci AS billing_package_product_cd,
pack.billing_product_id AS billing_package_product_id,
oci.serv_cde_oci AS billing_service_product_cd,
serv.billing_product_id AS billing_service_product_id,
oci.aft_qty_oci AS billing_prod_inst_qty,
NVL (TRIM (oci.item_status_oci),
'U'
) AS billing_prod_inst_status_cd,
TO_DATE (DECODE (oci.bill_start_dte_oci,
c_null_date, NULL,
oci.bill_start_dte_oci
)
) AS billing_start_dttm,
TO_DATE
(DECODE (oci.connect_dte_oci,
c_null_date, NULL,
oci.connect_dte_oci
)
) AS blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm,
DECODE (oci.offer_id_oci,
0, NULL,
oci.offer_id_oci
) AS product_offering_id,
CASE
WHEN oci.sys_oci = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END AS data_source_type_cd
FROM stg.vnt_oci_cur_item oci INNER JOIN t_account_vantage_xref xref
ON xref.sub_acct_num = oci.sub_acct_no_oci
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_billing_product pack
ON pack.billing_product_cd = oci.bill_cde_oci
AND pack.data_source_type_cd =
CASE
WHEN oci.sys_oci = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_billing_product serv
ON serv.billing_product_cd = oci.serv_cde_oci
AND serv.data_source_type_cd =
CASE
WHEN oci.sys_oci = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END
WHERE oci.record_load_cd IS NULL
AND MOD (ASCII (SUBSTR (oci.ROWID, LENGTH (oci.ROWID), 1)),
g_max_thread
) = (g_this_thread - 1);

-- Staged OCI_CUR_ITEM for loading order items
CURSOR cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord
IS
SELECT
-- staging control data
oci.ROWID AS ID, oci.record_load_cd,

-- surrogate keys
s_bus_interact_item_id.NEXTVAL AS bus_interact_item_id,
ord_xref.bus_interact_id, acct_xref.account_id,
job_xref.bus_interact_id job_bus_interact_id,
-- columns
oci.serv_id_oci,
oci.order_no_oci || oci.serv_id_oci AS source_system_id,
oci.order_no_oci AS ord_no,
DECODE (oci.job_seq_no_oci,
0, r.request_type_cd,
'WRKORD'
) AS bus_interact_item_type_cd,
oci.bef_qty_oci AS before_item_qty,
oci.aft_qty_oci AS after_item_qty,
oci.bill_cde_oci AS package_billing_product_cd,
pack.billing_product_id AS package_billing_product_id,
oci.serv_cde_oci AS service_billing_product_cd,
serv.billing_product_id AS service_billing_product_id,
TO_DATE (DECODE (oci.bill_start_dte_oci,
c_null_date, NULL,
oci.bill_start_dte_oci
)
) AS bill_start_dttm,
oci.lob_act_oci AS impacted_line_of_business_cd,

--Commented and modified as below as part of NRT-INnitial Load sync on 31-Mar-2015
--oci.item_status_oci AS product_order_item_status_cd,
NVL (TRIM (oci.item_status_oci),
'U'
) AS product_order_item_status_cd,
oci.job_seq_no_oci AS sequence_num,
TO_DATE (DECODE (oci.create_dte_oci,
c_null_date, NULL,
oci.create_dte_oci
)
) AS create_dttm,
CASE
WHEN oci.sys_oci = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END AS data_source_type_cd
FROM stg.vnt_oci_cur_item oci INNER JOIN t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref ord_xref
ON ord_xref.ord_no = oci.order_no_oci
INNER JOIN t_bus_interact bi
ON bi.bus_interact_id = ord_xref.bus_interact_id
INNER JOIN t_request r
ON r.request_interaction_id = bi.bus_interact_id
INNER JOIN t_account_vantage_xref acct_xref
ON acct_xref.sub_acct_num = oci.sub_acct_no_oci
--LEFT OUTER JOIN t_busn_intrn_vnt_job_xref job_xref
INNER JOIN t_busn_intrn_vnt_job_xref job_xref
ON job_xref.order_num = oci.order_no_oci
AND job_xref.job_seq_num = oci.job_seq_no_oci
AND oci.job_seq_no_oci > 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_billing_product pack
ON pack.billing_product_cd = oci.bill_cde_oci
AND pack.data_source_type_cd =
CASE
WHEN oci.sys_oci = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END
AND pack.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_billing_product serv
ON serv.billing_product_cd = oci.serv_cde_oci
AND serv.data_source_type_cd =
CASE
WHEN oci.sys_oci = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END
AND serv.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
WHERE oci.record_load_cd IS NULL
AND MOD (ASCII (SUBSTR (oci.ROWID, LENGTH (oci.ROWID), 1)),
g_max_thread
) = (g_this_thread - 1);

TYPE t_cursor_data_tbl_svc IS TABLE OF cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc%ROWTYPE
INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

TYPE t_cursor_data_tbl_ord IS TABLE OF cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord%ROWTYPE
INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

TYPE t_ptr_tbl IS TABLE OF PLS_INTEGER
INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

-- Forward declarations
PROCEDURE insert_billing_prod_inst (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_svc
);

PROCEDURE insert_bus_interact_item (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord
);

PROCEDURE insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
);

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_item (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
);

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_item_status (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
);

PROCEDURE insert_special_req_item (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
);

PROCEDURE insert_special_req_item_status (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
);

PROCEDURE insert_work_order_item (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
);

PROCEDURE insert_work_order_item_status (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
);

PROCEDURE update_staging_svc (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl_svc
);

PROCEDURE load_service (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE load_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
);

FUNCTION filter_item_for_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_select_order_type IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_type_cd%TYPE
)
RETURN t_ptr_tbl;

PROCEDURE LOAD (
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_this_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_max_thread NUMBER DEFAULT 1,
p_batchsize NUMBER DEFAULT 1000
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure LOAD
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : The procedure LOAD will execute the main procedures i.e. load_order
|| and load_service by logging the details.
*****************************************************************************************************************
*/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'LOAD';
l_process_name t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_process_rec pkg_logging.t_process_rec;
BEGIN
l_process_rec.process_name := l_process_name;
pkg_logging.begin_process (l_process_rec,
'p_audit_user_i=' || p_audit_user_i
);
g_this_thread := p_this_thread;
g_max_thread := p_max_thread;
g_batchsize := p_batchsize;
load_order (p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
load_service (p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception (l_process_rec,
DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, 'ERROR WHILE PROCESSING');
RAISE;
END LOAD;

PROCEDURE load_service (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure load_service
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : The procedure load_service will load the oci_items as account services. An inner join
|| is done to t_account_vantage_xref xref, the assumption being that the accounts should
|| have been loaded already, and that all current items map to an account.
|| NOTE: Check for any unprocessed (record_load_cd is null) after the initial load
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'LOAD_SERVICE';
l_process_name t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_cursor_data t_cursor_data_tbl_svc;
l_filter_ptr t_ptr_tbl; -- for filtering items in the cursor table
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', Start');

IF pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name)
THEN
RETURN;
END IF;

IF (cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc;
END IF;

OPEN cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc;

LOOP
FETCH cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc
BULK COLLECT INTO l_cursor_data LIMIT g_batchsize;

IF (l_cursor_data.COUNT () > 0)
THEN
-- Insert billing_prod_inst
insert_billing_prod_inst (p_process_rec_i, l_cursor_data);
-- Update the staging rows with status
update_staging_svc (p_process_rec_i, l_cursor_data);
-- Commit the batch
COMMIT;
END IF;

EXIT WHEN (l_cursor_data.COUNT () < g_batchsize)
OR (pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name));
END LOOP;

CLOSE cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', End');
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;

IF (cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_oci_cur_item_svc;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
RAISE;
END load_service;

PROCEDURE load_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure load_order
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This PROCEDURE load_order will load the oci_items into the corresponding 'order'
|| item tables. There won't always be an existing order for the item.
|| In that case, it won't be loaded.
|| NOTE: load_order will not update the status on the staging
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'LOAD_ORDER';
l_process_name t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_cursor_data t_cursor_data_tbl_ord;
l_filter_ptr t_ptr_tbl; -- for filtering items in the cursor table
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', Start');

IF pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name)
THEN
RETURN;
END IF;

IF (cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord;
END IF;

OPEN cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord;

LOOP
FETCH cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord
BULK COLLECT INTO l_cursor_data LIMIT g_batchsize;

IF (l_cursor_data.COUNT () > 0)
THEN
-- Insert bus_interact_item
insert_bus_interact_item (p_process_rec_i, l_cursor_data);
-- PRODUCT_ORDER_ITEM
-- Filter product order items
l_filter_ptr :=
filter_item_for_order (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
'PRDORD'
);
insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
insert_prod_order_item (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
insert_prod_order_item_status (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
l_filter_ptr.DELETE;
-- SPECIAL_REQUEST_ITEM
-- Filter special request items
l_filter_ptr :=
filter_item_for_order (p_process_rec_i, l_cursor_data,
'SPLREQ');
insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
insert_special_req_item (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
insert_special_req_item_status (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
l_filter_ptr.DELETE;
-- WORK_ORDER_ITEM
-- Filter work order items
l_filter_ptr :=
filter_item_for_order (p_process_rec_i, l_cursor_data,
'WRKORD');
---------------------------------------------- Added below by Cognizant On 16-Feb-2015
insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
---------------------------------------------- Added by Cognizant On 16-Feb-2015
insert_work_order_item (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
insert_work_order_item_status (p_process_rec_i,
l_cursor_data,
l_filter_ptr
);
l_filter_ptr.DELETE;
--update_staging_ord (p_process_rec_i, l_cursor_data);
-- Commit the batch
COMMIT;
END IF;

EXIT WHEN (l_cursor_data.COUNT () < g_batchsize)
OR (pkg_utility.stopnow (c_pkg_name));
END LOOP;

CLOSE cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;

IF (cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_oci_cur_item_ord;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END load_order;

PROCEDURE insert_billing_prod_inst (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_svc
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure insert_billing_prod_inst
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This PROCEDURE insert_billing_prod_inst will Insert billing_prod_inst
|| rows from staging data
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'INSERT_BILLING_PROD_INST';
l_errors NUMBER;
l_coll_idx PLS_INTEGER;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', cnt='
|| p_cursor_data_io.COUNT ()
);

BEGIN
FORALL i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_io.COUNT SAVE EXCEPTIONS
INSERT INTO t_billing_prod_inst a
(a.billing_prod_inst_id,
a.data_source_type_cd,
a.source_system_id, a.origin_bus_interact_item_id,
a.billing_package_product_id,
a.billing_package_product_cd,
a.billing_service_product_id,
a.billing_service_product_cd,
a.account_id,
a.product_offering_id,
a.billing_prod_inst_status_cd,
a.blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm,
a.billing_start_dttm,
a.billing_prod_inst_qty, a.seasonal_start_dttm,
a.seasonal_end_dttm, a.record_stat, a.created_dttm,
a.created_by
)
VALUES (p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_prod_inst_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).data_source_type_cd,
p_cursor_data_io (i).source_system_id, NULL,
p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_package_product_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_package_product_cd,
p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_service_product_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_service_product_cd,
p_cursor_data_io (i).account_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).product_offering_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_prod_inst_status_cd,
p_cursor_data_io (i).blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm,
p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_start_dttm,
p_cursor_data_io (i).billing_prod_inst_qty, NULL,
NULL, 'A', SYSTIMESTAMP,
c_pkg_name
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN c_bulk_errors
THEN
l_errors := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS.COUNT;

FOR i IN 1 .. l_errors
LOOP
NULL;
l_coll_idx := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_INDEX;
p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).record_load_cd := c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', bulk insert exception, key='
|| p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).account_id
|| ':'
|| p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).billing_service_product_cd
|| ', exception='
|| SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_CODE
);
END LOOP;
END;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
END insert_billing_prod_inst;

PROCEDURE insert_bus_interact_item (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure insert_bus_interact_item
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This PROCEDURE insert_bus_interact_item will Insert t_bus_interact_item data.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'INSERT_BUS_INTERACT_ITEM';
l_errors NUMBER;
l_coll_idx PLS_INTEGER;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', cnt='
|| p_cursor_data_io.COUNT ()
);

BEGIN
FORALL i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_io.COUNT SAVE EXCEPTIONS
INSERT INTO t_bus_interact_item a
(a.bus_interact_item_id,
a.data_source_type_cd,
a.source_system_id,
a.bus_interact_id,
a.bus_interact_item_type_cd,
a.record_stat, a.created_dttm, a.created_by
)
VALUES (p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_item_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).data_source_type_cd,
p_cursor_data_io (i).source_system_id,
DECODE
(p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_item_type_cd,
'WRKORD', p_cursor_data_io (i).job_bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_id
),
p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_item_type_cd,
'A', SYSTIMESTAMP, c_pkg_name
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN c_bulk_errors
THEN
l_errors := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS.COUNT;

FOR i IN 1 .. l_errors
LOOP
NULL;
l_coll_idx := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_INDEX;
p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).record_load_cd := c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', bulk insert exception, key='
|| p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).source_system_id
|| ', exception='
|| SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_CODE
);
END LOOP;
END;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
END insert_bus_interact_item;

PROCEDURE insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : The PROCEDURE will load the table t_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref';
l_errors NUMBER;
l_coll_idx PLS_INTEGER;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', cnt='
|| p_cursor_data_io.COUNT ()
);

BEGIN
FORALL i IN VALUES OF p_filter_i SAVE EXCEPTIONS
INSERT INTO t_bus_interact_item_vnt_xref a
(a.order_num,
a.serv_id,
a.bus_interact_item_id,
a.bus_interact_item_type_cd,
a.record_stat, a.created_dttm, a.created_by
)
VALUES (p_cursor_data_io (i).ord_no,
p_cursor_data_io (i).serv_id_oci,
p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_item_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_item_type_cd,
'A', SYSTIMESTAMP, c_pkg_name
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN c_bulk_errors
THEN
l_errors := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS.COUNT;

FOR i IN 1 .. l_errors
LOOP
NULL;
l_coll_idx :=
p_filter_i (SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_INDEX);
p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).record_load_cd := c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', bulk insert exception, key='
|| p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).source_system_id
|| ', exception='
|| SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_CODE
);
END LOOP;
END;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
END insert_bus_inter_item_vnt_xref;

PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_item (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_filter_i IN t_ptr_tbl
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure insert_prod_order_item
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This PROCEDURE insert_prod_order_item will Insert t_prod_order_item data.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'INSERT_PROD_ORDER_ITEM';
l_errors NUMBER;
l_coll_idx PLS_INTEGER;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', cnt='
|| p_cursor_data_io.COUNT ()
);

BEGIN
FORALL i IN VALUES OF p_filter_i SAVE EXCEPTIONS
INSERT INTO t_prod_order_item a
(a.product_order_item_id,
a.data_source_type_cd,
a.product_order_id,
a.account_id,
a.before_item_qty,
a.after_item_qty, a.item_action_cd,
a.package_billing_product_id,
a.package_billing_product_cd,
a.service_billing_product_id,
a.service_billing_product_cd,
a.billed_amt, a.bill_start_dttm,
a.account_impact_cd, a.line_of_business_impact_cd,
a.impacted_line_of_business_cd,
a.record_stat, a.created_dttm, a.created_by
)
VALUES (p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_item_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).data_source_type_cd,
p_cursor_data_io (i).bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).account_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).before_item_qty,
p_cursor_data_io (i).after_item_qty, NULL,
-- ADD, CHG, DEL in xdw
--NULL,
p_cursor_data_io (i).package_billing_product_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).package_billing_product_cd,
--NULL,
p_cursor_data_io (i).service_billing_product_id,
p_cursor_data_io (i).service_billing_product_cd,
NULL, p_cursor_data_io (i).bill_start_dttm,
NULL, NULL,
p_cursor_data_io (i).impacted_line_of_business_cd,
'A', SYSTIMESTAMP, c_pkg_name
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN c_bulk_errors
THEN
l_errors := SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS.COUNT;

FOR i IN 1 .. l_errors
LOOP
NULL;
l_coll_idx :=
p_filter_i (SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_INDEX);
p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).record_load_cd := c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', bulk insert exception, key='
|| p_cursor_data_io (l_coll_idx).source_system_id
|| ', exception='
|| SQL%BULK_EXCEPTIONS (i).ERROR_CODE
);
END LOOP;
END;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
END insert_prod_order_item;

PROCEDURE update_staging_svc (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl_svc
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure update_staging_svc
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This PROCEDURE update_staging_svc will update stg.vnt_oci_cur_item data.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_STAGING_SVC';
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name);
FORALL i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_i.COUNT
UPDATE stg.vnt_oci_cur_item s
SET s.record_load_cd =
NVL (p_cursor_data_i (i).record_load_cd, c_stg_processed),
s.record_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE ROWID = p_cursor_data_i (i).ID;
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
END update_staging_svc;

FUNCTION filter_item_for_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl_ord,
p_select_order_type IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_type_cd%TYPE
)
RETURN t_ptr_tbl
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure filter_item_for_order
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This filters WO or Spl Request/Prod Order
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'FILTER_ITEM_FOR_ORDER';
l_temp t_ptr_tbl;
l_idx PLS_INTEGER := 0;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name);

FOR i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_i.COUNT
LOOP
IF (p_cursor_data_i (i).bus_interact_item_type_cd =
p_select_order_type
)
THEN
IF (p_select_order_type = 'WRKORD')
THEN
IF ( p_cursor_data_i (i).sequence_num > 0
AND p_cursor_data_i (i).job_bus_interact_id IS NOT NULL
)
THEN
l_idx := l_idx + 1;
l_temp (l_idx) := i;
END IF;
ELSE
IF (p_cursor_data_i (i).sequence_num = 0)
THEN
l_idx := l_idx + 1;
l_temp (l_idx) := i;
END IF;
END IF;
END IF;
END LOOP;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i, l_proc_name || ', end');
RETURN l_temp;
END filter_item_for_order;
END pkg_vnt_load_oci_cur_item;
